General.Name: Shenzhen Lihexing Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Lihexing Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of automation and intelligent equipment for information and communication technology industry in China. The company offers stud welding machines, OLED flexible screen laminating machines, LCD panel automatic exposure equipment, soft pack battery testing equipment, automatic plastic packaging equipment, 5G dielectric filter test and adjustment equipment, and non-standard customized equipment, as well as operates a product transfer platform. Its products are used in the detection and manufacturing of mobile smart terminals and network infrastructure devices. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Huide Building, Office Building No. 1, Shenzhen, China, 518131
